faqs.question: What is EchoSurge?
faqs.answer: EchoSurge is a pioneering technology startup focused on GEO services and AI communication technology.
faqs.title: What is EchoSurge? | EchoSurge FAQ
faqs.description: Learn about EchoSurge, a technology startup focused on GEO services and AI communication.

faqs.question: How do I contact support?
faqs.answer:
You can contact our support team by emailing [hello@echosurge.ai](mailto:hello@echosurge.ai).

**Support is available for:**

- Technical issues
- Billing questions
- General inquiries

For more information, visit our [Contact Page](/en/contact).
faqs.title: How do I contact support? | EchoSurge FAQ
faqs.description: Find out how to contact EchoSurge support for assistance.

faqs.question: How do I update my billing information?
faqs.answer:
To update your billing information, go to your account settings and click on **Billing**.

1. Navigate to [Account Settings](/en/account).
2. Click on the **Billing** tab.
3. Update your payment details.

If you need help, contact [support](mailto:hello@echosurge.ai).
faqs.title: How do I update my billing information? | EchoSurge FAQ
faqs.description: Instructions for updating your billing information with EchoSurge.

faqs.question: Can I get a refund?
faqs.answer: Refunds are handled on a case-by-case basis. Please review our [Refund Policy](/en/refund-policy) and contact support if you believe you are eligible.
faqs.title: Can I get a refund? | EchoSurge FAQ
faqs.description: Learn about EchoSurge's refund policy and how to request a refund.
